statements: SELECT * FROM VolunteerPreferences
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM VolunteerPreferences
SELECT volunteer_id, availability FROM VolunteerPreferences WHERE volunteer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM VolunteerPreferences WHERE preferences->>'interest' = 'Education'
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM VolunteerPreferences ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM VolunteerPreferences WHERE volunteer_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT name, email FROM VolunteerPreferences WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM VolunteerPreferences WHERE preferences->>'interest' = 'Animals'
SELECT name, phone_number FROM VolunteerPreferences WHERE availability->'days' @> '[
Monday
SELECT volunteer_id, preference FROM Volunteer_Preferences;
SELECT preference, volunteer_id FROM Volunteer_Preferences;
SELECT volunteer_id, day_of_week, available_times FROM Volunteer_Availability WHERE day_of_week='Monday';
SELECT volunteer_id, day_of_week, available_times FROM Volunteer_Availability WHERE available_times='Morning';
SELECT * FROM Volunteer_Preferences JOIN Volunteer_Availability ON Volunteer_Preferences.volunteer_id = Volunteer_Availability.volunteer_id;
SELECT volunteer_id, preference FROM Volunteer_Preferences WHERE preference = 'Pets'
SELECT * FROM Volunteer_Availability WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND available_times LIKE '%morning%'
SELECT volunteer_id, day_of_week, available_times FROM Volunteer_Availability WHERE volunteer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002'
SELECT preference, COUNT(*) AS total_volunteers FROM Volunteer_Preferences GROUP BY preference ORDER BY total_volunteers DESC
SELECT volunteer_id, day_of_week FROM Volunteer_Availability WHERE day_of_week IN ('Monday','Wednesday')
SELECT * FROM volunteer_preferences;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, phone_number FROM volunteer_preferences WHERE availability > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, status, deadline FROM task_assignments WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT volunteer_id, communication_type FROM communication_logs ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT communication_type, COUNT(*) AS communication_count FROM communication_logs GROUP BY communication_type;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_preferences WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteer_preferences WHERE availability > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, deadline, status FROM task_assignments ORDER BY deadline DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT volunteer_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM communication_logs WHERE volunteer_id = 2 ORDER BY communication_date;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM task_assignments WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM VolunteerPreferences WHERE volunteer_id = 100;
SELECT volunteer_id, availability FROM VolunteerPreferences WHERE preference = 'Childcare';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM VolunteerContactInfo;
SELECT volunteer_id, day_of_week, available_start_time, available_end_time FROM VolunteerAvailability WHERE volunteer_id = 200;
SELECT volunteer_id, skill_type, proficiency_level FROM VolunteerSkills WHERE proficiency_level = 'Expert';
SELECT preference, availability FROM VolunteerPreferences WHERE volunteer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM VolunteerSkills WHERE skill_type = 'Programming' AND proficiency_level = 'Advanced' ORDER BY volunteer_id DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM VolunteerContactInfo WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM VolunteerAvailability WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND available_start_time >= '09:00:00' ORDER BY available_end_time ASC;

SELECT volunteer_id, preference, availability FROM VolunteerPreferences INNER JOIN VolunteerContactInfo ON VolunteerPreferences.volunteer_id = VolunteerContactInfo.volunteer_id WHERE contact_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT assignment_name, status FROM Assignments WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT volunteer_id, skill_name FROM Volunteers JOIN VolunteerSkills ON Volunteers.volunteer_id = VolunteerSkills.volunteer_id;
SELECT availability_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM Availability WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT v.full_name, s.skill_name FROM Volunteers v INNER JOIN VolunteerSkills vs ON v.volunteer_id = vs.volunteer_id INNER JOIN Skills s ON vs.skill_id = s.skill_id;
SELECT v.full_name, a.assignment_name, a.status FROM Volunteers v LEFT JOIN Assignments a ON v.volunteer_id = a.volunteer_id WHERE a.status = 'Pending';
SELECT v.full_name, av.day_of_week, av.start_time, av.end_time FROM Volunteers v INNER JOIN Availability av ON v.volunteer_id = av.volunteer_id WHERE av.day_of_week = 'Monday';
